content: {"name": "Christ Church of Redford", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Distribution starts 9:45 am\nPlease bring your green gleener / fogtogotten harvest card", "email": "", "url": "https://www.christchurchredford.org/ministry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "14350 Wormer Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Redford Charter Township", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48239", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3911068, "longitude": -83.2778853}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 534-3462", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:15"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:15"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "State ID required"}]}
